testcase.name: Validating the URL - Redirect creation
testcase.system-out: Given Enter the "mmarimuthu@vmware.com" and "Leavemealone@2401".............passed When User is on home page...................................................passed Then Click on the profile icon..............................................passed Then Click on the Admin option..............................................passed Then Click on Selfservice option from leftNavigation panel..................passed Then Click on URL Redirect Option...........................................passed Then Verify the Source URL field is loaded..................................passed Then Filter the Status option by Enabled....................................passed Then Search for the Source URL - Available..................................passed And Disable if it is available..............................................passed Then Enter the value for Source URL.........................................passed Then Enter the value for Target URL.........................................passed Then Select the Date value..................................................passed Then Click on POST button...................................................passed Then Verify the error-sucess message........................................passed Then Click on close button in the pop up....................................passed Then Verify the created URL redirect........................................passed Then Click on Version History option of created URL redirect................passed Then Verify the result......................................................passed Then Click on close button..................................................passed
